verbose_text: It has been demonstrated that the expression and localization of DMT1 and FPN1 in duodenal enterocytes is not affected by iron status, neither in suckling piglets at postnatal day 16 nor in suckling rat pups at postnatal day 10, indicating an immature regulation of iron [XREF_BIBR, XREF_BIBR].
evidence: expression and localization of DMT1 and FPN1
